pattern instructions the pattern starts off with crocheting the spiral squares which are then joined spiral squares using your colored yarn make a magic loop and make 1sc 2hdc 3dc in the magic loop remove the hook from the last stitch and make a slipknot with the black yarn in the magic loop make 1 standing single_crochet 2hdc 3dc there should be 6 sts in black and 6 in your colored yarn round 1 keep using the black yarn make 2dc in the colored single_crochet make 2dc in each of the next 5 sts remove your hook and insert it back into the colored yarn and make 2dc in the black single_crochet make 2dc in each of the next 5 sts there should be 12 double_crochet total in black and 12 double_crochet total in the colored yarn round 2 keep using the colored yarn * in the next stitch make 2dc make 1 double_crochet in the next stitch * repeat between * * 5 more times remove your hook and reinsert it back into the black yarn repeat between * * 6 times there should be 18 double_crochet total in black and 18 double_crochet total in the colored yarn round 3 keep using the black yarn * in the next stitch make 2dc make 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * repeat between * * 5 more times remove your hook and reinsert it back into the colored yarn repeat between * * 6 times make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts make 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts slip_stitch in the next stitch chain 1 and fasten_off your yarn leave a tail to weave in later do not repeat this for the black yarn just yet there should be 19 double_crochet total in black and 24 double_crochet + 2hdc + 2sc + 1 slip_stitch total in the colored yarn round 4 using the black yarn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts make 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts slip_stitch in the next st and chain 2 this doesn t count as a st * all in the same st make 2dc ch1 2dc 1 double_crochet in the next st 1hdc in each of the next 3 sts 1sc in each of the 6 next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1dc in next st * repeat between * * 3 more times slip_stitch into the first double_crochet of the round and fasten_off join your squares using the black yarn either by pressing the squares wrong sides together and making sl sts into the back loops or by your preferred join note i recommend using a slightly larger hook 4
